subject: Fix Fireblocks SDK environment: sandbox → production
body:
The workspace is on console.fireblocks.io (US Production console) with a
Testnet workspace - not the separate sandbox.fireblocks.io environment.

- Update VITE_NCW_SDK_ENV to production in docs and .env.example
- Update .env.example to use Firebase config instead of Supabase
- Add clarifying comments about sandbox vs production

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
title: Fix Fireblocks SDK environment: sandbox → production
